string-array.name: advisor_short
string-array.item: Sorry, dude. If only you get loan..

string-array.name: advisor_long
string-array.item: You can get this money within your week allowance
You can get ths money within week budget but have to lower your daily spending
You can get this money within your month allowance and lower your next week spendings to keep on track
You can spend using the amout left for month and some or your wishes savings
You can spend this money but you`ll have no more wishes and saving balance left
